1.brief: a word; by implication, a matter (as spoken of) or thing; adverbially, a cause
David, the youngest son of Jesse
hinder; generally, late or last; specifically (as facing the east) western
David, the youngest son of Jesse
a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
properly, a valiant man or warrior; generally, a person simply
to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)
properly, the top; specifically, the highest (i.e. God); also (adverb) aloft, to Jehovah
anointed; usually a consecrated person (as a king, priest, or saint); specifically, the Messiah

gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
delightful (objective or subjective, literal or figurative)
a song to be accompanied with instrumental music
Jisrael, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity

2.brief: wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
a word; collectively, a discourse; figuratively, a topic
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
the tongue (of man or animals), used literally (as the instrument of licking, eating, or speech), and figuratively (speech, an ingot, a fork of flame, a cove of water)

3.brief: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
Jisrael, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity
perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
properly, a cliff (or sharp rock, as compressed); generally, a rock or boulder; figuratively, a refuge; also an edge (as precipitous)
Jisrael, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity
ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
fear (also used as infinitive); morally, reverence

gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative

4.brief: illumination or (concrete) luminary (in every sense, including lightning, happiness, etc.)
properly, dawn (as the break of day); generally, morning
properly, to irradiate (or shoot forth beams), i.e. to rise (as the sun); specifically, to appear (as a symptom of leprosy)
the sun; by implication, the east; figuratively, a ray, i.e. (architectural) a notched battlement
properly, dawn (as the break of day); generally, morning
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
properly, an envelope, i.e. darkness (or density, 2 Chronicles 4:17); specifically, a (scud) cloud; also a copse
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)

5.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
properly, set upright; hence (figuratively as adjective) just; but usually (as adverb or conjunction) rightly or so (in various applications to manner, time and relation; often with other particles)
a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
adverb or preposition, with (i.e. in conjunction with), in varied applications; specifically, equally with; often with prepositional prefix (and then usually unrepresented in English)
strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
a compact (because made by passing between pieces of flesh)

to put (used in a great variety of applications, literal, figurative, inferentially, and elliptically)
to set in a row, i.e. arrange, put in order (in a very wide variety of applications)
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
properly, to hedge about (as with thorns), i.e. guard; generally, to protect, attend to, etc.

properly, to touch, i.e. lay the hand upon (for any purpose; euphemistically, to lie with a woman); by implication, to reach (figuratively, to arrive, acquire); violently, to strike (punish, defeat, destroy, etc.)
to fill or (intransitively) be full of, in a wide application (literally and figuratively)
iron (as cutting); by extension, an iron implement
a tree (from its firmness); hence, wood (plural sticks)

properly, session; but used also concretely, an abode or locality

something prepared, i.e. any apparatus (as an implement, utensil, dress, vessel or weapon)
Joab, the name of three Israelites
a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)

38.brief: Ira, the name of three Israelites
a Jithrite or descendant of Jether
Gareb, the name of an Israelite, also of a hill near Jerusalem
a Jithrite or descendant of Jether

39.brief: Urijah, the name of one Hittite and five Israelites
a Chittite, or descendant of Cheth
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
seven (as the sacred full one); also (adverbially) seven times; by implication, a week; by extension, an indefinite number
